description: Labrynnian Blue Bears already had razor charp claws to maul faces off, they became even more deadly after a proffesional training filed the imperfections away from them.
tooltip: Labrynnian Blue Bears already had razor charp claws to maul faces off, they became even more deadly after a proffesional training filed the imperfections away from them. (Blue Caballero damage increased by 20%)
